title: signup statistics
extract: OECD Statistics. Definition: Registration method refers to continuous, permanent, compulsory recording of the occurrence of vital events together with certain identifying or descriptive characteristics concerning them, as provided through the civil code, laws or regulations of each country.Nov 20, 2001
extract_html: OECD Statistics.
